mapper.sql: id, question_id, number, content, create_time, is_delete
mapper.select:
select
from t_question_option where is_delete='n' and question_id = #{questionId} order by number asc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_question_option
id,
question_id,
number,
content,
create_time,
is_delete,

mapper.update:
update t_question_option
question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_question_option set question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
